answer: A JavaScript library created for building fast and interactive user interfaces for web and mobile applications
It lets you develop a top UI for both web and mobile applications
A component-based library that divides the UI into little reusable pieces
Object is where you store property values that belongs to the component
JavaScript compiler that includes the ability to compile JSX into regular JavaScript.
JavaScript Extension Syntax used in React to easily write HTML and JavaScript together
Concept where an ideal, or “virtual”, representation of a UI is kept in memory and synced with the “real” DOM
Is an independent and reusable bits of code. They serve the same purpose as JavaScript functions, but work in isolation and return HTML
